title: Lights Below - The Lights Below EP
description:
Lights Below - The Lights Below EP

The first release from Vancouver-based screamo/hardcore band. Release independently in 2005, the band has since followed it up with the much heavier, more mature "She Teaches Defeat" in 2007. Since this album is currently our of print, and no plans exist to reprint it, the band has fully encouraged their fans to share it freely online. 

The EP features 6 songs written and recorded in 2004.

Tracklisting:

1. Pianos & Painkillers
2. Hotel Staff
3. Your New Favourite Word
4. Room Four
5. Dead Lights On Duthie
6. The Overwhelmed

Produced and engineered at The Hive Studios in Burnaby, BC by Stu Mckillop and JJ Heath.

Mastered at Northwest Mastering by Stu Mckillop.

TDOT Records
